content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with a drop position at (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), and (-13.5, -49.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-11.5, -49.5) and (-10.5, -49.5)

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with a drop position at (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5), (41.5, -78.5), and (43.5, -80.5)

### Iron Plate Storage and Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chests at positions (-17.5, -47.5), (-16.5, -47.5), (-15.5, -47.5), and (-14.5, -47.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-10.5, -45.5) and (-11.5, -45.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), and (-8.5, -44.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when refueling entities
- Ensure the correct entity type is at the specified position before attempting to refuel.
- Double-check the entity's position and type to avoid refueling errors.

### Errors when inserting items
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.
- Regularly check and manage your inventory to ensure you have necessary resources available for operations.
